daily: Check pump operation and listen for unusual sounds
Verify relay functionality - all valves responding
Check for leaks at fittings and connections
weekly: Calibrate EC meter with 1413 μS/cm solution
Calibrate pH meter with 7.0 and 4.0 buffers
Check tubing for kinks or wear
monthly: Replace air stones if using aeration
Check pump calibration accuracy - run test dispenses
Inspect all tubing for wear, replace if needed
Verify all sensor readings against manual measurements
quarterly: Replace EC/pH probes (or as needed based on drift)
Full system flush with cleaning solution
Review and update SOPs based on learnings

ec_solutions.notes: 84 μS/cm and 1413 μS/cm are standard calibration solutions

ph_solutions.notes: Always calibrate at room temperature. Start with 7.0, then 4.0.

calibration_tips: Rinse probe with distilled water between solutions
Allow reading to stabilize before accepting
Store pH probe in storage solution, not distilled water
Replace probes if calibration won't hold

trichome_indicators.clear: Too early - THC not fully developed
trichome_indicators.amber: THC degrading to CBN - sedative effect

timing_notes: Check trichomes on buds, not sugar leaves

ec_too_high: Check for salt buildup in lines
ph_drifting: Check probe storage - use storage solution not water
Replace probe if old or damaged
pump_not_dispensing: Check for air in lines - prime pump
Verify tubing not kinked or worn
